Ratings.comment: This is the best tutor I have ever met. She is so caring and helpful. Definitely take it again.
She is very good! I really like her.

Not the best TA. Seemed to be very knowledgeable about the topic and caring, but overall wasn't very good at offering help. Most students in my class didn't pay attention and just did the worksheet ourselves because she didn't add much content. Great grader and lenient though

She was okay. Class is pretty structured and content isn't too bad. Overall she grades easy on discussion posts, but is very hit or miss for essays. Either you will do well, or make a small mistake and it'll end up costing you your grade.

I took 367.01 thinking this would be an easy second writing class. well it was but melissa crum is probably the most incompetent teacher i have met here at OSU. She is terribly unorganized and has no idea what she is talking about. Want an easy A? Take this class but just make sure you dont get her. Its dreadful.

One of the worst professors I have ever had. Does not teach correctly, and when compared to other professors who teach Italian, he is by far the hardest one. He expects you to know things without his help. He constantly calls people out for not doing well on quizzes. Quiz grades are poor due to the lack of care about our success within the class.

He is a very helpful professor. We transitioned to zoom because of corona and he has been so accessible and always loves when you participate. He doesn't really specifically teach you certain verb tenses or things like that, but encourages you to ask him about them.

Prof. Scaltriti was honestly THE best Professor I have ever had. He is a native speaker with a sexy accent, so that made class more enjoyable. On the plus side, he is very handsome and that was a good motivation to study Italian. I hope I will have him next year! He is THE man!
Cool guy
Alan was a great teacher, he taught us how to believe in ourselves, and that if we put our minds to it, we could achieve anything. If it weren't for alban, I would have never finished college.
Best teacher ever.
Best BIO T.A. I have ever had!! Adam was extremely helpful and always answered ever question I had without hesitation! Great Guy!!!
Really nice and helpful! Also cute and charming :)
Great guy, made lab fun and exciting. Was able to get the concepts behind each lab across quickly and easily.

Worst TA I have had in my 2 years at OSU.  I actually contacted him to have a 1 on 1 during office hours to go over the midterm because I was struggling and he basically told me to go through it myself because he was busy. He had a smug attitude that I also didn't appreciate.
Great TA.  Knows his stuff.  Grades fair.  He doesn't fool around a lot but he's a good guy.
very helpful in lab. answers all questions
i have no comment on this course...
Very helpful though he sometimes answers your question with his own question.  Very laid back and made the lab enjoyable. Plus he's cute :P

Yu-Yen knows what he is talking about, but doesn't allot any time to talking about homework or quizzes, which is what math recitation is all about. Complaining to the math department didn't fix the problem. If you get this guy, DROP HIM ASAP.
He was my TA for chem 121 and was pretty obnoxious and not too helpful.  He seemed to be trying to be "cool" rather than an effective TA.
No Comments
Compelling course, Vicki had an intense desire to teach us about the field of visual culture. Very interesting and would definitely reccomend.

Ms. Daiello was very helpful! She kept in contact with me and answered all of my questions as best as she could. She also was an advocate on my behalf in talking to the professors. She gave a lot of feedback on all assignments and seemed to genuinely care that her students did well. Easy A and fun class, just read the book and keep up!
